algorithm_technique: Sweep line algorithm using a dictionary to track color sum changes at segment endpoints.
problem_summary_simple: Describe a painting made of overlapping colored segments with minimum non-overlapping segments.
problem_summary_technical: Sweep line approach: use a dictionary to store color sum changes at segment start/end points, then iterate to form new segments.
key_insights: The problem can be solved by tracking the net change in color sums at each coordinate.
A sweep-line approach is effective: process events (segment start/end) in sorted order of coordinates.
The `counts` dictionary stores the net change in color sum at each point, allowing reconstruction of the painting.
